content: he s here everyone s favourite berserk character the schnoz hardships trauma death - he perseveres through it all with an unshakable spirit he truly deserves the role of main character now you can make your own schnoz companion he s only about 3 7 5 cm tall and 3 5 9 cm from nose tip to butt but don t let his diminutive stature fool you every inch of his body hides incredible power you can also make a giant version or maybe it would be a more true to life version anyway i made a big schnoz he s 6 15 cm tall and 7 5 19 cm wide he s got a decent heft to him because of the amount of stuffing that went into him you can spend a toonie and get a nice printable pdf version of the pattern or check it out on my website for free
